channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk's Takeover Is Being Aided by a Trumpworld Power Couple
item.description: Stephen and Katie Miller—he's "the prime minister," sources say; she's DOGE's comms guru—liaise between the White House and Elon Musk, and are central...

item.title: Spyzie stalkerware is spying on thousands of Android and iPhone users
item.description: Another little-known phone monitoring outfit has quietly amassed half a million customers, whose email addresses are now in Have I Been Pwned. © 2024 ...

item.title: Waymo has doubled its weekly robotaxi rides in less than a year
item.description: Waymo is logging more than 200,000 paid robotaxi rides every week, according to Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai, who shared the stat about the tech giant’s...

item.title: Meta fires around 20 employees for leaking confidential information
item.description: Meta has fired “roughly” 20 employees for leaking confidential information, The Verge reports. “We tell employees when they join the company, and we o...

item.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-4.5 for ChatGPT—It’s Huge and Compute-Intensive
item.description: Internally called Orion, GPT-4.5 is OpenAI’s largest model to date, and it’s first available through the company’s $200 monthly ChatGPT subscription.

item.title: USAID Was Promised Emergency Waivers for Ebola and AIDS. They’re Not Working
item.description: Elon Musk claims he mistakenly fired Ebola prevention workers, then quickly fixed the error. But Ebola programs are still in tatters, along with other...

item.title: The 66 Best Movies on Disney+ Right Now (March 2025)
item.description: Longlegs, Raiders of the Lost Ark, and Deadpool & Wolverine are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: The US May Start Vaccinating Chickens Against Bird Flu
item.description: With egg prices soaring, the US is considering vaccinating laying chickens, which have been hit particularly hard by the avian influenza outbreak.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says the company is ‘out of GPUs’
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said that the company was forced to stagger the rollout of its newest model, GPT-4.5, because OpenAI is “out of GPUs.” In a post...

item.title: Twitch is letting more streamers access its monetization tools
item.description: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy published an open letter on Thursday outlining the platform’s plans for 2025, which include upcoming features, updates to the mo...
